hero.headline: Design, build, run, and measure AI-powered service journeys.
hero.body: DBX Solutions is a CX consultancy that plugs in as a full-service task force for enterprise and high-growth SMB service organizations, bringing a distributed bench of architects, engineers, and operators spanning discovery, implementation, and post-launch governance.
points: Conversational + agentic AI across voice and digital channels
Enterprise-grade rigor sized for Fortune 50 and SMB orgs alike
CRM, CCaaS, and custom data integrations without handoffs
Governance playbooks that keep adoption on track

value.noteText: = kickoff to production release of the first automation wave.

hero.utility: Enterprise + SMB CX programs delivered across NA · LATAM · EMEA.

services.title: Three service pillars that keep CX modernization moving.
services.description: Each pillar is modular—engage DBX Solutions for the full lifecycle or plug specific gaps inside your existing program.

cards.title: Advisory Lab
cards.description: Strategy, discovery, and ROI modeling to rank automation bets.

cards.title: Build Studio
cards.description: Hands-on design and implementation across voice + digital channels.
cards.artifacts: Safety cases, data contracts, QA scorecards

cards.title: Operate Office
cards.artifacts: KPI cockpit, escalation paths, training kits

solutions.title: Packaged outcomes you can mix and match.
solutions.description: Each card represents a repeatable play honed across enterprises. Use them as-is or as a starting point for your unique use cases.

cards.title: Automated service desk
cards.body: Voice and digital flows that authenticate customers, surface answers, and escalate with full context.

cards.title: Guided selling & retention
cards.body: Agentic copilots that recommend offers, coach agents, and trigger workflows inside CRM.

cards.title: Back-office automation
cards.body: Case triage, data collection, and notifications spanning ERP, ticketing, and custom APIs.

cards.title: Feedback & analytics
cards.body: Survey orchestration, insight pipelines, and KPI dashboards tied to business impact.

smb.title: Accelerators sized for small & mid-market teams.
smb.description: Modular engagements designed for lean CX, RevOps, and support teams that need enterprise-grade guardrails without enterprise overhead.

cards.title: 90-day automation lift
cards.body: Rapid discovery, pre-built intent libraries, and packaged integrations that snap into HubSpot, Zendesk, or Freshworks.

cards.title: Shared delivery pod
cards.body: Blend your internal ops team with DBX engineers to design, build, and govern cross-channel AI journeys.

cards.title: Fractional PS + analytics
cards.body: Monthly sprints that prioritize roadmap health, KPI instrumentation, and change management for evolving SMB orgs.

cards.title: Fraud triage + secure messaging
cards.body: Loan status, collections coaching, fraud triage, and encrypted client servicing with audit trails.

cards.title: Care navigation copilots
cards.body: Intake, benefits checks, Rx reminders, and omnichannel patient routing with PHI guardrails.

cards.title: Conversational commerce
cards.body: Order management, loyalty, warranties, and guided selling tied to live inventory.

cards.title: Irregular ops control tower
cards.body: Itinerary servicing, disruption comms, and loyalty concierge with 24/7 agent assist.

process.title: Four tightly managed phases.
process.body: No handoffs. DBX Solutions stays accountable from kickoff through adoption.

steps.title: Discovery
steps.body: Interviews, data diagnostics, and ROI scoring to stack-rank opportunities.

steps.title: Design
steps.body: Journey flows, safety rails, and proof points validated with stakeholders.

steps.title: Build & Integrate
steps.body: Implementation across channels, data, and tooling with observability baked in.

steps.title: Measure & Adopt
steps.body: Enablement, runbooks, and governance cadences that institutionalize outcomes and prep the next wave.

process.optionsTitle: Plug DBX Solutions where you need it.

options.title: Acceleration Sprint
options.body: 3-week war room to unblock or relaunch a stalled CX GenAI initiative.

options.title: Fractional PS Lead
options.body: Part-time Professional Services leadership to steer roadmap + governance.

options.title: Launch Assurance
options.body: Readiness reviews, risk desk, and day-0 response plan for enterprise launches.

options.title: Advisory Retainer
options.body: Quarterly strategic partner for roadmap prioritization and exec reporting.

testimonials.quote: DBX unified sales engineering, delivery, and customer success into one motion. We launched our AI messaging program faster than expected and finally have governance we can trust.
testimonials.author: VP, Customer Experience — Global Retailer

testimonials.quote: They parachuted into a stalled automation program and had our compliance, data, and CX teams aligned in two working sessions. The pilot hit 28% deflection without harming CSAT.
testimonials.author: Head of Contact Center — Digital Bank

founder.name: Ricardo De Biase
founder.body: Solutions Architect & Professional Services leader with a foundation in network engineering and a decade delivering AI-powered CX for enterprises across the Americas and EMEA.
bullets: Master’s in IT Management; dual Bachelor’s in IT and Networking
AWS Certified Solutions Architect & MCSE (Windows Server)
Comfortable in English, Spanish, and Portuguese engagements
why: One accountable lead from discovery through adoption
Platform-agnostic across CRMs, CCaaS, GenAI stacks, and bespoke apps
Global-ready delivery for multilingual, regulated environments

contact.title: Ready to design your next automation wave?
contact.body: Drop a quick brief or grab time directly. Every inquiry routes to DBX Solutions and gets a response within one business day.

form.name: Full name
form.placeholderMessage: e.g., Launch a multilingual agentic copilot across chat + voice.

calendly.title: 45-min working session
calendly.body: Embed a Calendly slot here to let buyers book instantly. Slots show real-time availability synced to your primary calendar.

footer.warning: Delete when finalized · No production assets
